original_text: A very hot fire can remove the dirt from silver and make it pure. I punish my people to make them pure, but it is useless. There are too many wicked people, so I cannot make them pure. A very hot fire can remove the dirt from silver and make it pure. I punish my people to make them pure, but it is useless. There are too many wicked people, so I cannot make them pure. A very hot fire can remove the dirt from silver
korean_text: 풀무불을 맹렬히 불면 그 불에 납이 살라져서 단련하는 자의 일이 헛되게 되느니라 이와 같이 악한 자가 제거되지 아니하나니

sentences.original_text: A very hot fire can remove the dirt from silver
sentences.korean_translation: 아주 뜨거운 불은 은에서 더러운 것을 제거할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: I punish my people to make them pure
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 백성을 순수하게 만들기 위해 벌을 준다

sentences.original_text: There are too many wicked people
so I cannot make them pure
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 그들을 순수하게 만들 수 없다

sentences.original_text: A very hot fire can remove the dirt from silver
sentences.korean_translation: 아주 뜨거운 불은 은에서 더러운 것을 제거할 수 있다
